page.title: 11Roads and traffic
page.content: The A435 from Cheltenham to Cirencester mainly caries local traffic and some from the Midlands tom the south.The Cirencester Road(A435) is mainly very busy early in the morning with people going to work ie commuters and stocking up shops with goods from lorries.The busiest half hour was 8.30-9.00.This contained 61 cars & 35 lorries coming from Cheltenham(southbound) & northbound there were 94 cars & 24 lorries.Altogether there were 2 motorbikes,227 cars &73 lorries on the northbound & 3 motorbikes,211 cars &101 lorries.Altogether there were 688 vehicles.315 were southbound.Therefore most of the transport was going to Cheltenham.The only other road of any form in the area is the unclassified Iron Age route known as the White Way which carries some traffic from Cirencester to Andoversford.
